title: The Robot moles
creator_credit: Gakken Company, Masaji Hara, Matsue Jimbo and Tadanori Okamoto
brief_description: Japanese animated puppet film. Hanako, a little girl who loves flowers, makes a drawing of a mechanical mole which would cultivate flowers. The scientists mistake it for an order to construct such a device, and build a team of robot moles.
creator_credit_for_label: Gakken Company, Masaji Hara, Matsue Jimbo and Tadanori Okamoto
